reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night before an early flight from Weeze. The service was excellent and staff spoke excellent English. The room was large and spotlessly clean, as was the bathroom. Staff also booked a taxi to the airport for us which only cost €12.60. There are a few bars and restaurants nearby. Ideal for a stop over.
reviews.title: Great service

reviews.text: Pension Rongen is only a few kilomters away from Düsseldorf Weeze airport. Perfect when you have an early flight. Kevins pub, just a couple of hundred meters away, serves great dinner.
reviews.title: Perfect when flying early

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We don't like this B&B, it's dirty. The beds are terrible, the bathroom is freezing....
reviews.title: Dirty place
